description:
You can use Dell Command | Update to update a Dell system with the latest drivers, BIOS, firmware, and Dell software applications.

Dell Command | Update provides the following new features:

- Support for installing base drivers on a system that contains only an operating system, network adapter, a compatible network adapter driver, and an installation of Dell Command | Update, using the Advanced Driver Restore feature.
- Support for updating intra-component dependencies as shown in the Partner Development Kit (PDK) catalog.
- Notification when system restore points are created.
- Enhanced updates Schedule — You can configure Dell Command | Update to automatically check for updates on the system at specific intervals of time

This UWP package provides the Dell Command | Update Application and is supported on OptiPlex, Venue Pro Tablet, Precision, XPS Notebook and Latitude models that are running the following Windows operating system: Windows 10 > = RS1+ (build 14393) systems.

*Note that this is not an upgrade to the non-UWP version. You will need to manually uninstall older versions of Dell Command | Update before installing this Windows 10/UWP version.*

#### Package updates

This package is automatically updated by referencing the data feed provided by Dell. Should it be outdated by more than a few days please leave a comment below.
summary: Dell utility that allows you to automate driver, BIOS and firmware updates on your system for Windows 10
author: Dell Inc
